channel.title: Click = new teleports
channel.description:
ok well how could i do this and i know delta has it :) LUCKY BASTARD :)
Ok well click on 1 tele and it takes me to another thing like the pits north south thing and be able to make them teleports? thanks

i did try what i mean is lets say i click on my varrock teleport after this is done it brings up the 5 i belive orbs from the tzhaar area one says north etc. ill switch that and where they take you i just need to make it u click the varrock tele and it shows that

item.title: Click = new teleports
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

HahBahGee:

lol easy, go into the file that says “teleport.txt” lol change the X and Y coordinates in that and save it, to change text, go to the “texthandler.txt” file and change it there…

learn to use other sources hahbahgee
and windows explain a bit more
and try it on your own first so people can help you with errors
